DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate impact obesity surgery chronic inflammation .
DOC.detailed_description: A retrospective study compare impact laparoscopic sleeve gastrectomy ( LSG ) , laparoscopic Roux-en Y- gastric bypass ( LRYGB ) laparoscopic omega-loop gastric bypass ( LOLGB ) chronic inflammation metabolic syndrome .
DOC.criteria: BMI > 35kg/m² obesityrelated disease BMI > 40kg/m² acute inflammation laboratory examination
